message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $14,000?

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you considering my budget.  I'm really interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  Would you be willing to accept $13,000?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $13,500, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
